blocks.name: rmoxfrd
blocks.content: Transfer "at most one" restricted quantification from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Apr-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rmoxfrd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wrmo(s0, c0, w1), wrmo(s1, c1, w2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(c2, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wreu(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w0, wrmo(s0, c0, w1), wrmo(s1, c1, w2), wmo(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)))
  3bitr4g(w0, wmo(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wmo(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)), wi(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))), wi(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)), weu(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2))))
  imbi12d(w0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)), weu(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)))
  3bitr3g(w0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)), wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s1, c1, w2))
  rexxfrd(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0, w1, w2)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)), wreu(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2)))
  reurex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  df-rex(s0, c0, w1)
  df-rex(s1, c1, w2)
  3bitr3g(w0, weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), weu(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2)), wreu(s0, c0, w1), wreu(s1, c1, w2))
  reuxfr4d(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, w0, w1, w2)
  df-reu(s0, c0, w1)
  df-reu(s1, c1, w2)
  moeu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))
  moeu(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w2))
  df-rmo(s0, c0, w1)
  df-rmo(s1, c1, w2)
}
